db.data: 027F;LATIN SMALL LETTER REVERSED R WITH FISHHOOK;Ll;0;L;;;;;N;LATIN SMALL LETTER REVERSED FISHHOOK R;;;;;;;30;1.1

desc.data: ¶= long leg turned iota (a misnomer)¶• apical dental vowel¶• used by linguists working on Chinese and other Sino-Tibetan languages¶• IPA spelling - 007A 0329¶• preferred presentation is with a descender
